name: Death Hawk
description:
Death Hawk is an immersive First Person VR Arcade Space Fighter, which aims to bring a nostalgic arcade game feel with a modern twist of technology with  VR and stunning visuals.

Playing as the Hawk Moths, one of two legendary renegade space pirate gangs, you must fight for resources, territory and honour. It is down to you to complete the arial course, avoiding weapon fire and asteroids along the way to win this gang war. 

Glory and unbelievable riches await the bravest among us. 

Game Story 

In Quadrant Beta 431, a bitter rivalry has become a showdown among the stars. Fierce tensions are growing between two renegade space pirate gangs for lucrative territory and pride. 

The Hawk Moths, with their fast flyers, swoop in to attack in the blink of an eye, liberating all treasures for themselves. Even death cannot save those who defy them, for legendary rumour tells of the Hawk Moths travelling to the spirit world to torture ungenerous souls.   

Their biggest rival is the Sharks. Brutes of ferocity and efficiency, their firepower has no equal. After hunting down and ambushing their prey, they disable their victims' defences in seconds.  

This Quadrant is not big enough for these two fierce gangs; only one can have the riches of this lucrative freighter route. Today, everything will change … The Death Hawks have a plan. Their target is the Shark’s prized fighter. Destroy that, and Quadrant Beta 431 is theirs.

Players will blast their way through Shark ships to destroy their competition, whilst collecting power-ups, new weapon choices and health resources from passing freighters.  Once a pirate always a pirate. 

Good Luck fighter! 

Let's defeat these Knave Sharks. Bring us glory and riches!

Core Features:

  • Arcade track and flight system 
  • Stunning stylised realistic visuals
  • A VR experience 
  • 3D Arcade combat shooter 
  • Scavenging and weapon upgrading system

Controls 

This game requires an Oculus Quest 2

System requirements:

  • Oculus Quest 2
  • Link cable
